alert.note: Alert for Deuel; Grant; Marshall; Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 18 at 2:10PM MDT until March 19 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 3 PM CDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Marshall, Roberts, Grant and Deuel Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 3 PM CDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Cold wind chills between 15 and 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Low-level drifting of loose snow will also result in hazardous travel conditions, especially along stretches of Interstate 29 between the Summit and Peever areas.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
